posts.post_content:
Good Morning,


Love the site, starting to foray into Tobacco cards. I have quite the Chattanooga Lookouts uniform collection, and feel a T210 Chattanooga card or 2 need to be apart of it. Can anyone help me locate some? Additionally any Chattanooga cards Pre-1960 also! Thanks for any help!

Let's see some pics of the uniform collection!

Cheer,
Geno

[quote name="HercDriver" post=1760724]Let's see some pics of the uniform collection!

Cheer,
Geno[/QUOTE]

I think I can arrange that. I will post when I get a few taken!
